articles.title: Giles Coren out as BBC 2 Amazing Hotels presenter following Twitter spat - Daily Mail
articles.description: Mr Coren, 53, announced he would move on from the broadcaster due to a 'diary clash', almost a year on from facing huge backlash over two tweets that allegedly mocked the death of a journalist.
articles.content:
TV presenter Giles Coren has left his job at the BBC after a Twitter row, The Mail+ has revealed. 
Mr Coren, 53, had co-presented BBC2's Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby with Monica Galetti pri… [+3742 chars]
